about.title: About Me
about.text: A passionate and proficient Software Engineer with a strong foundation in front-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. I specialize in creating responsive, accessible, and optimized web applications. With experience in collaborating with designers and developers, I excel at transforming project requirements into high-quality, user-friendly interfaces. I am familiar with modern tools and frameworks like Figma, jQuery, and Mailchimp, and I am always eager to learn and adapt to new technologies to drive innovation and efficiency.

experience.title: Experience
experience.summary: With a solid background as an HTML Developer and Software Engineer, I have a proven track record of developing and maintaining web pages and applications. My experience spans across various companies, where I have honed my skills in front-end technologies. I have collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, including React, WordPress, and Shopify developers, providing high-quality HTML and SCSS to build modern and responsive websites.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developing, testing, and maintaining HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Javascript for web pages and web applications.
Collaborating with designers, developers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and deliverables.
Ensuring that web pages and web applications are responsive, accessible, and optimized for different browsers and devices, including adhering to ADA Compliance Standards.
Creating and managing web page templates, layout designs, and user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.
Implementing and testing email campaigns using tools like Litmus and Mailchimp to ensure cross-platform compatibility and adherence to industry standards.
Keeping up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and new technologies to improve code quality and efficiency.
Performing code reviews, debugging, and troubleshooting to identify and fix errors and performance issues in web pages, email templates, or applications.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for various web projects.
Contributed to projects like Byzfunder, ThePhix, Gloria Agency, Green Light Finance, and Taxi Transfer.
